cannot-create-folder: Could not create the Verifactu folder: %folder%
cannot-save-file: Could not save the Verifactu file: %file%
company-certificate-empty: The company's certificate cannot be empty.
company-certificate-password-empty: The company's certificate password cannot be empty
company-not-configured-verifactu: The company is not configured with Verifactu.
company-not-esp: The company is not in Spain
company-report-sii-configured: The company is already configured with SII
company-ticketbai-configured: The company is already configured with TicketBAI
company-verifactu-no-exercises: The company has no Verifactu exercises
erp-decimals-not-2: The number of decimals for the installation is not 2
error-cert-expired: The Verifactu certificate has expired: %valid_from% to %valid_to%
error-cert-no-data: The Verifactu certificate does not contain data: %file%
error-cert-not-qualified: The Verifactu certificate is not a qualified certificate.
error-saving-certificate: Error saving the Verifactu certificate: %file% in folder %folder%
exercise-not-configured: The fiscal year %codejercicio% is not configured with Verifactu
invalid-operacion-exenta-combination: If Tax is 01, 03, or empty, and RegimeCode is 01, ExemptTransaction E2 and E3 cannot be checked.
invoice-annulment-desc-1: Send an annulment to Verifactu to cancel the invoice
invoice-annulment-desc-2: Cancel an invoice is not the same as making a rectifying invoice, 99% of the time you must create a rectifying invoice to correct errors or modify data from the original invoice. Cancellation is used when the invoice is no longer valid, the client does not have it, is not in accounting, or the program does not allow deleting the original invoice
invoice-annulment-modal: Are you sure you want to cancel the invoice? This cannot be undone.
invoice-high-desc: Send the invoice to Verifactu for the first time for validation, verification, and registration
invoice-high-third-desc: If the invoice is already registered in Verifactu from another system or program, mark the invoice as sent from a third party
invoice-remedy-desc-1: Solo se pueden modificar datos de la cabecera de la factura, como son los datos del cliente, no es posible editar l√≠neas o totales.
invoice-remedy-desc-2: Only client data such as NIF/CIF, name or company name, address, etc. can be modified, but invoice data such as number, date, amount, etc. cannot be modified.
json-desglose-base-imponible-acoste-inva: The BaseImponibleAcoste field can only be present if the tax type is 02 or 06, or ClaveRegimen is 06
json-desglose-calificacion-operacion-n1-: The equivalence surcharge type and the equivalence surcharge quota must not be present if the operation qualification type is N1 or N2 and the tax is 01
The tax type and the charge must not be present if the operation qualification type is N1 or N2 and the tax is 01
json-desglose-calificacion-operacion-s2-: The passed-on quota field must be present if the transaction rating type is S2.
The S2 transaction type is only allowed if the invoice type is F1, F3, R1, R2, or R4.
The tax type must exist and be filled if the operation qualification type is S2
json-desglose-clave-regimen-02-operacion: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen is 02, the OperacionExenta field must exist
json-desglose-clave-regimen-03-calificac: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 03, the CalificacionOperacion field with S1 must exist
json-desglose-clave-regimen-04-calificac: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 04, the CalificacionOperacion field must exist with S2 or OperacionExenta
json-desglose-clave-regimen-06-base-impo: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field must be 06, the BaseImponibleAcoste field is mandatory
json-desglose-clave-regimen-06-tipo-fact: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 06, the invoice type (current %TipoFactura%) must be F1, F3, or R5
json-desglose-clave-regimen-07-calificac: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 07, the CalificacionOperacion field (current %CalificacionOperacion%) must exist with S2, N1, or N2
json-desglose-clave-regimen-07-operacion: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 07, the OperacionExenta field (current %OperacionExenta%) with E2, E3, E4, or E5 must exist
json-desglose-clave-regimen-08-calificac: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 08, the CalificacionOperacion field (current %CalificacionOperacion%) with N2 must exist
json-desglose-clave-regimen-10-calificac: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 10, the CalificacionOperacion field (current %CalificacionOperacion%) must exist with N1.
json-desglose-clave-regimen-10-destinata: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 10, all recipients must have an NIF
json-desglose-clave-regimen-10-tipo-fact: If the tax is 01 or 03, and the ClaveRegimen field is 10, the invoice type (current %TipoFactura%) must be F1
json-desglose-clave-regimen-11-tipo-impo: If the tax is 01, and the ClaveRegimen field is 11, the TipoImpositivo field (current %TipoImpositivo%) 21 must exist
json-desglose-clave-regimen-14-destinata: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 14, all recipients must have a NIF and start with P, Q, S, or V
json-desglose-clave-regimen-14-fecha-ope: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 14, the operation date (current %FechaOperacion%) must be greater than the invoice issuance date (current %FechaExpedicionFactura%)
If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 14, the FechaOperacion field is required.
json-desglose-clave-regimen-14-tipo-fact: If the tax is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen field is 14, the invoice type (current %TipoFactura%) must be F1, R1, R2, R3, or R4
json-desglose-clave-regimen-20-invalid: If the tax is 03, the ClaveRegimen field (current %ClaveRegimen%) must be from the L8B table and additionally value 20
json-desglose-clave-regimen-21-invalid: If the tax is 03, the ClaveRegimen field (current %ClaveRegimen%) must be from table L8B and additionally the value 21
json-desglose-clave-regimen-igic-invalid: If the tax is 03, the ClaveRegimen field must exist and contain a value from table L8B
json-desglose-clave-regimen-invalid: If the tax is 01, the ClaveRegimen field must exist and contain a value from table L8A.
json-desglose-clave-regimen-required: The ClaveRegimen field is mandatory if the tax (current %Impuesto%) is 01 or 03
json-desglose-cuota-repercutida-invalid: The CuotaRepercutida field can only be non-zero if CalificacionOperacion is S1
json-desglose-cuota-repercutida-required: The CuotaRepercutida field is mandatory if CalificacionOperacion is S1 and the BaseImponibleAcoste field does not exist
json-desglose-cuota-repercutida-signo-in: The CuotaRepercutida and BaseImponibleOimporteNoSujeto fields must have the same sign.
The CuotaRepercutida and BaseImponibleACoste fields must have the same sign.
json-desglose-cuota-repercutida-tipo-imp: The CuotaRepercutida field is mandatory if the CalificacionOperacion is S1 and the BaseImponibleACoste field does not exist
json-desglose-cuota-repercutida-valor-in: The calculation of the CuotaRepercutida with BaseImponibleOimporteNoSujeto is incorrect, the calculated value %calculated% has a deviation of more than 10 euros compared to the expected value %expected%.
The calculation of CuotaRepercutida with BaseImponibleACoste is incorrect, the calculated value %calculated% has a deviation of more than 10 euros from the expected value %expected%
json-desglose-operacion-exenta-clave-reg: If the tax field is 01 or 03, the ClaveRegimen 01 field cannot be marked as ExemptOperation E2 or E3
json-desglose-operacion-exenta-igic-inva: If the tax field is 03, the OperacionExenta field must be E7 or E8
json-desglose-operacion-exenta-invalid: If the tax field is 01, the OperacionExenta field must be E1, E2, E3, E4, E5, or E6.
json-desglose-operacion-exenta-tipo-impo: If the OperacionExenta field is filled, the fields TipoImpositivo, CuotaRepercutida, TipoRecargoEquivalencia, and CuotaRecargoEquivalencia cannot be filled
json-desglose-simplificadas-total-invali: In a simplified invoice, the total of the breakdowns must equal the total amount of the invoice, with a deviation of more than 10 euros.
json-desglose-tipo-impositivo-2-invalid: The tax rate 2 can only be applied if the DateOperacion (or InvoiceIssuanceDate) %FechaOperacion% is between 01-10-2024 and 31-12-2024
json-desglose-tipo-impositivo-5-invalid: The tax rate 5 can only be if FechaOperacion (or FechaExpedicionFactura) %FechaOperacion% is between 01-07-2022 and 30-09-2024
json-desglose-tipo-impositivo-5-required: The tax rate 5 is mandatory when the Tax is 01 and CalificacionOperacion is S1
json-desglose-tipo-impositivo-7-5-invali: The tax rate 7.5 can only be applied if FechaOperacion (or FechaExpedicionFactura) %FechaOperacion% is between 01-10-2025 and 31-12-2025.
json-desglose-tipo-impositivo-invalid: Only tax types 0, 2, 4, 5, 7.5, 10, and 21 are allowed when the Tax is 01 and CalificacionOperacion is S1
json-desglose-tipo-recargo-equivalencia-: Only TypeImpositivo 0 and TypeRecargoEquivalencia (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) 0 can be indicated when the date (current %FechaOperacion%) of the operation (or invoice issuance) is between 01-01-2023 and 30-09-2024
If the TaxType is 10, the EquivalentSurchargeType (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) can only be 1.4.
If the TaxType is 21, the EquivalentSurchargeType (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) can only be 5.2 or 1.75

TypeImpositivo 2 and TipoRecargoEquivalencia (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) 0.26 can only be specified when the date (current %FechaOperacion%) of the transaction (or invoicing) is between 01-10-2024 and 31-12-2024
Only TaxType 4 and EquivalentSurchargeType (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) can be indicated, with a rate of 0.5
Only TaxType 5 and EquivalentSurchargeType 0.5 can be indicated when the date (current %FechaOperacion%) of the operation (or invoice issuance) is less than or equal to 31-12-2022

Only TaxType 5 and EquivalenceSurchargeType 0.62 can be indicated when the date (current %FechaOperacion%) of the operation (or invoice issuance) is greater than or equal to 01-01-2023 and less than or equal to 30-09-2024
Only TaxType 7.5 and EquivalenceSurchargeType 1 can be indicated when the date (current %FechaOperacion%) of the operation (or invoice issuance) is between 01-10-2025 and 31-12-2025
Only the equivalent surcharge type (current %TipoRecargoEquivalencia%) 0, 0.26, 0.5, 0.62, 1, 1.4, 1.75, 5.2 is allowed when the tax is 01 and CalificacionOperacion is S1
json-desgloses-empty: The breakdowns field cannot be empty, it must contain at least one breakdown
json-high-substation-error: Error sending the registration or correction to Verifactu: %error%
json-id-acuerdo-sistema-informatico-not-: The validation of the agreement ID from the computer system has not been performed.
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-es-for-idty: The recipient's identification type is 07, so the country code must be ES
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-in-eu-desti: The country code is not valid, it must be an EU country code if the recipient's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-in-eu-gener: The country code is invalid; it must be a country code from the EU if the generator's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-in-eu-siste: The country code is not valid, it must be an EU country code if the information system's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-in-eu-third: The country code is not valid; it must be a country code from the EU if the third party's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
json-invalid-codigo-pais-not-required-fo: The country code is not required if the generator's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
The country code is not mandatory if the IT system NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
The country code is not required if the third party's NIF is a Spanish VAT NIF
json-invalid-cuota-total: The total amount is invalid, the calculated total amount %calculated% has a deviation of more than 10 euros from the expected total amount %expected%
json-invalid-cupon-only-with-r5-r1: The coupon field is only allowed if the invoice type is R5 or R1.
json-invalid-desglose: The invoice breakdown is not valid; it must contain at least one detail
json-invalid-destinatarios-more-than-100: The recipients field can only contain a maximum of 1000 recipients.
json-invalid-destinatarios-not-allowed-f: The recipients field cannot be present if the invoice type field is F2 or R5.
json-invalid-factura-simplificada-art-72: The simplified invoice field art. 72-73 can only be present if the invoice type field is F1, F3, R1, R2, R3, R4 or R5
json-invalid-factura-sin-identif-destina: The field invoice without recipient identification art. 61d can only be present if the invoice type field is F2 or R5
json-invalid-facturas-rectificadas-only-: The corrected invoices field can only be present if the invoice type field is R1, R2, R3, R4, or R5.
json-invalid-facturas-sustituidas-only-w: The replaced invoices field can only be present if the invoice type field is F3
json-invalid-fecha-hora-huso-gen-registr: The registration date and time is not valid, the date from json %jsonDate% must be less than or equal to the current date and time %currentDate%
json-invalid-huella-anterior-format: The previous fingerprint is invalid, it must be a hexadecimal string of 64 uppercase characters
json-invalid-id-sistema-informatico: The id %id% of the computer system is not valid
json-invalid-idtype-02-only-with-f1-f3-r: The recipient's identification type cannot be 02 if the invoice type field is F1, F3, R1, R2, R3, or R4
json-invalid-idtype-07-sistema-informati: The identification type of the computer system cannot be 07.
json-invalid-idtype-07-third: The third-party identification type cannot be 07
json-invalid-idtype-for-codigo-pais-es-d: The recipient's identification type must be 03 or 07 if the country code is ES
json-invalid-idtype-for-codigo-pais-es-s: The identification type for the information system must be 03 if the country code is ES
json-invalid-idtype-for-codigo-pais-es-t: The identification type must be 03 for the third party if the country code is ES
json-invalid-idtype-generador-required-w: The generator's identification type must be 03 or 07 when the GeneradoPor field is 'D' and the country code is ES
When the GeneradoPor field is 'T' and the country code is ES, the generator's identification type must be 03
json-invalid-idtype-not-allowed-generado: When the GeneradoPor field is 'T', the identification type of the generator cannot be 07
json-invalid-importe-total: The total amount is not valid, calculated total amount %calculated% has a deviation of more than 10 euros from the expected total amount %expected%
json-invalid-invoice-date: The invoice date is invalid, it must be less than or equal to the current date and greater than 28/10/2024.
json-invalid-invoice-date-operation: The invoice date must be earlier than the operation date
json-invalid-invoice-number: The invoice does not have a valid number; it can only contain ASCII characters from 32 to 126.
json-invalid-nif-and-idotro-both-defined: The recipient's NIF and idotro cannot be defined at the same time
The generator's NIF and the idotro cannot be defined at the same time
The NIF of the computer system and idotro cannot be defined at the same time
The third party NIF and idotro cannot both be defined at the same time
json-invalid-nif-tercero-same-as-emisor-: The NIF of the third party cannot be the same as that of the invoice issuer
json-invalid-operation-date: The operation date is invalid, it cannot be earlier than %minDate% or later than %maxDate%
json-invalid-operation-date-current: The operation date cannot be later than the current date.
json-invalid-rechazo-previo-only-with-su: The previous rejection field can only be 'S' if the rectification field is present and is 'S'
json-invalid-recipient-nif: The recipient's NIF/CIF is not valid: %cifnif% - %clientname%
json-invoice-missing-idotro: The idotro field is missing in the invoice JSON.
json-missing-destinatarios-required-for-: The recipients field is mandatory if the issued by third party or recipient field is 'D'
The recipients field is mandatory if the invoice type field is F1, F3, R1, R2, R3, R4, or R5
json-missing-group-generadopor: The GeneradoPor field is mandatory when the generator group exists
json-missing-group-generador: The generator group is mandatory when the GeneradoPor field exists.
json-missing-importe-rectificacion-only-: The adjustment amount field can only be present if the corrective type field is 'S'
json-missing-importe-rectificacion-requi: The rectification amount field is mandatory if the rectification type field is 'S'
json-missing-macrodato-required-for-larg: The macrodato field is mandatory if the total amount of the invoice is equal to or greater than 100,000,000.00 euros
json-missing-nif-generador-required-when: The generator's NIF is mandatory when the GeneradoPor field is 'E'
json-missing-nif-or-idotro-required-dest: The recipient's NIF or idotro is mandatory, they cannot be empty
json-missing-nif-or-idotro-required-gene: The generator's NIF or idotro are mandatory; they cannot be empty
json-missing-nif-or-idotro-required-sist: The NIF of the information system or the idotro is mandatory and cannot be empty
json-missing-nif-or-idotro-required-thir: The third party's NIF or idotro are mandatory; they cannot be empty
json-missing-nombre-sistema-informatico-: The name of the information system is required; it cannot be empty
json-missing-rechazo-previo-only-with-su: The prior rejection field can only be present if the remedy field is present and is 'S'
json-missing-recipient-data: Missing recipient data in JSON: Series %codserie% - CIF/NIF %cifnif% - Company name %clientname%
json-missing-tercero-required-for-t: The third-party field is mandatory if the issued by third party or recipient field is 'T'
json-missing-tipo-rectificativa-only-wit: The rectificativa type field can only be present if the invoice type field is R1, R2, R3, R4, or R5
json-missing-tipo-rectificativa-required: The rectifying type field is mandatory if the invoice type field is R1, R2, R3, R4, or R5
json-missing-tipo-uso-posible-multi-ot-r: The field possible use type multi OT is mandatory, it cannot be empty
json-missing-tipo-uso-posible-solo-verif: The possible use type only field Verifactu is mandatory, it cannot be empty
json-not-event-found: The event %event% from the JSON is not a valid Verifactu event
json-num-registro-acuerdo-facturacion-no: The validation of the billing agreement registration number has not been performed
mark-annulment-high-third: If the invoice has already been cancelled in Verifactu from another system or program, mark the invoice as cancelled by a third party
mark-invoice-annulment-high-third: Mark as canceled from a third party
mark-invoice-high-third: Mark as sent by a third party
not-found-breakdowns: No breakdowns found for the invoice.
report-verifactu-desc: This report shows the invoices sent to Verifactu and their status
required-empty-field: The field %field% is mandatory and cannot be empty.
too-many-breakdowns: Too many breakdowns for the invoice, a maximum of %subtotals% breakdowns are allowed.
verifactu-certificate-not-found: The certificate %certPath% Verifactu of the company %company% was not found.
verifactu-certificate-not-loaded: Failed to load the Verifactu certificate %certPath% for the company %company%.
verifactu-certificate-password-empty: The Verifactu certificate password cannot be empty.
verifactu-certificate-read-error: Error reading the Verifactu certificate from the company %company%: %error%
verifactu-company-has-events: The company already has Verifactu events.
verifactu-company-missing-id: The company is missing the Verifactu ID.
verifactu-company-not-configured: The company is not configured with Verifactu.
verifactu-event-not-saved: Could not save the Verifactu event.
verifactu-exercise-has-events: The exercise already has Verifactu events.
verifactu-exercise-mode-change: The exercise mode cannot be changed because it already has Verifactu events.
verifactu-invalid-date-range: The date range is not valid; the start date must be earlier than the end date and within the same fiscal year
verifactu-invalid-event: The Verifactu event is not valid.
verifactu-invalid-exercise-period: The start and end date must be within the chosen fiscal year
verifactu-invoice-already-annulled: The invoice has already been annulled in Verifactu
verifactu-invoice-already-high: The invoice is already registered in Verifactu
verifactu-invoice-edit-not-permitted: The field %field% cannot be modified, the allowed fields are: %permitted%
verifactu-invoice-has-events: The invoice already has Verifactu events.
verifactu-invoice-not-high: The invoice is not registered in Verifactu.
verifactu-invoice-substation-pending: There is a pending adjustment to send
verifactu-not-change-to-debug-mode: You cannot change to test mode because there are already records of invoices, events, or requirements in live mode
verifactu-qr-error: Error generating the QR code for Verifactu: %error%.
verifactu-removed-data-changed-to-debug-: All test data has been cleared upon switching to live mode
verifactu-requirement-delete-not-allowed: It is not allowed to delete the Verifactu requirement if it is not pending.
verifactu-requirement-line-add-failed: Error adding line %id_registro_factura% of the invoice record to the Verifactu requirement.
verifactu-signature-node-not-found: The signature node was not found in the Verifactu XML.
verifactu-signature-node-not-found-in-js: The signature node was not found in the Verifactu JSON.
xml-annulment-error: Error sending the cancellation to Verifactu: %error%
xml-missing-field: The field %field% was not found in the XML.
